title: Effortless Assignment Submission
description: Upload files or provide a website link directly. Our user-friendly interface makes submitting assignments a breeze!

title: Explore a World of Websites
description: Gain inspiration and learn from peers! Discover a gallery of submitted websites after deadlines or with instructor permission.

title: Never Miss a Deadline Again
description: Stay organized with clear deadline displays and pending submission notifications. Prioritize your work and ensure timely completion.

title: Provide Constructive Feedback (Instructors Only)
description: Instructors can access a dedicated grading interface to offer detailed feedback and marks on student assignments.

title: Peer Review Option (Optional)
description: Enable peer review functionality (optional). Students can provide feedback on each other's work, fostering a collaborative learning environment.

title: Access Past Submissions (For All)
description: Students and instructors can access past submissions for reference or portfolio building. Review progress and track learning over time.
